Title: An Act Changing the Name of the Balangiga Emergency Hospital in the Municipality of Balangiga, Eastern Samar, into Albino M. Duran Memorial Hospital
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 808
An Act Changing the Name of the Balangiga Emergency Hospital in the Municipality of Balangiga, Eastern Samar, into Albino M. Duran Memorial Hospital
Section 1. The name of the Balangiga Emergency Hospital in the Municipality of Balangiga, Eastern Samar, is hereby changed to Albino M. Duran Memorial Hospital.1awphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: April 27, 1984
